Properties.Name: TimeGenerated
Properties.Description: Timestamp (UTC) of when the incident was ingested

Properties.Name: IncidentName
Properties.Description: The resource name of the incident

Properties.Name: Title
Properties.Description: The title of the incident

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The description of the incident

Properties.Name: Severity
Properties.Description: The severity of the incident

Properties.Name: Status
Properties.Description: The status of the incident

Properties.Name: Classification
Properties.Description: The classification the incident was given when closed

Properties.Name: ClassificationComment
Properties.Description: Description of the reason the incident was closed

Properties.Name: ClassificationReason
Properties.Description: The classification reason the incident was given when closed

Properties.Name: Owner
Properties.Description: The user the incident is assigned to

Properties.Name: FirstActivityTime
Properties.Description: Timestamp (UTC) of when the first activity in the incident occured

Properties.Name: LastActivityTime
Properties.Description: Timestamp (UTC) of when the last activity in the incident occured

Properties.Name: LastModifiedTime
Properties.Description: Timestamp (UTC) of when the incident was last modified

Properties.Name: CreatedTime
Properties.Description: Timestamp (UTC) of when the incident was created

Properties.Name: IncidentNumber
Properties.Description: The sequential number of the incident

Properties.Name: RelatedAnalyticRuleIds
Properties.Description: The IDs of the Analytic rules associated with the incident

Properties.Name: AlertIds
Properties.Description: The IDs of the alerts related to the incident

Properties.Name: BookmarkIds
Properties.Description: The IDs of the bookmarks related to the incident

Properties.Name: Comments
Properties.Description: The comments added to the incident

Properties.Name: Labels
Properties.Description: The labels added to the incident

Properties.Name: IncidentUrl
Properties.Description: The URI to open the incident in Azure Sentinel portal

Properties.Name: AdditionalData
Properties.Description: Additional data on the incident

Properties.Name: ModifiedBy
Properties.Description: The source of the change in the incident
